title: bestonquest插件的NPC绑定
author: 特伦酥
txt_content:
我用的1.6.1版本的bestonquest，如果我想绑定的NPC的ID是14，对话文件是zhanshikaishi.yml，我的main.yml里的内容是这样

global_locations: ''
npcs:
  '0': innkeeper
  innkeeper: innkeeper
tag_point_prefix: 'false'
cancel: {}

请问我该如何添加

replies.author: 雪狼神
replies.txt_content:
global_locations: ''
npcs:
  '0': innkeeper
  innkeeper: innkeeper
  '14': zhanshikaishi
tag_point_prefix: 'false'
cancel: {}

replies.author: 特伦酥
replies.txt_content:
雪狼神 发表于 2016-1-30 09:24
global_locations: ''
npcs:
  '0': innkeeper
还是不行啊，右键NPC一点效果都没有，试了五六次了
